Howdy

I’m Ben Tanen. I am a computer scientist by training and I love all things data.

I’m fascinated by data visualization and data journalism and I aspire to use data to tell interesting stories.

ASL-LEX

A lexical database and visualization tool for teaching American Sign Language

Ultimate (?) Convex Hull

A visual tool to teach the Kirkpatrick-Seidel Ultimate Convex Hull algorithm

Adaptive Huffman Coding

A scrollytelling walkthrough introducing, comparing, and contrasting traditional and adaptive Huffman Coding algorithms

A visualization exploring alcohol consumption around the world and through time
